org.apache.streams.instagram.api

Interface Media

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Instagram

    public interface Media
    Media Endpoints. Comments Endpoints. Like Endpoints.
    See Also:
    https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/media/, https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/comments/, https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/likes/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommentsResponse comments(String media_id)
      Get a list of recent comments on a media object.
      UsersInfoResponse likes(String media_id)
      Get a list of users who have liked this media.
      MediaResponse lookupMedia(String media_id)
      Get information about a media object.
      SearchMediaResponse searchMedia(SearchMediaRequest parameters)
      Search for recent media in a given area.
      MediaResponse shortcode(String shortcode)
      This endpoint returns the same response as GET /media/media-id.

    • Method Detail

      • comments

        CommentsResponse comments(String media_id)
        Get a list of recent comments on a media object. The public_content scope is required for media that does not belong to the owner of the access_token.
        Parameters:
        media_id - media_id
        Returns:
        CommentsResponse @link{CommentsResponse}
        See Also:
        https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/comments/#get_media_comments

      • likes

        UsersInfoResponse likes(String media_id)
        Get a list of users who have liked this media. The public_content scope is required for media that does not belong to the owner of the access_token.
        Parameters:
        media_id - media_id
        Returns:
        UsersInfoResponse @link{UsersInfoResponse}
        See Also:
        https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/likes/#get_media_likes

      • lookupMedia

        MediaResponse lookupMedia(String media_id)
        Get information about a media object. Use the type field to differentiate between image and video media in the response. You will also receive the user_has_liked field which tells you whether the owner of the access_token has liked this media. The public_content permission scope is required to get a media that does not belong to the owner of the access_token.
        Parameters:
        media_id - media_id
        Returns:
        MediaResponse @link{MediaResponse}
        See Also:
        https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/media/#get_media

      • shortcode

        MediaResponse shortcode(String shortcode)
        This endpoint returns the same response as GET /media/media-id. A media object's shortcode can be found in its shortlink URL. An example shortlink is http://instagram.com/p/tsxp1hhQTG/. Its corresponding shortcode is tsxp1hhQTG.
        Parameters:
        shortcode - shortcode
        Returns:
        MediaResponse @link{MediaResponse}
        See Also:
        https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/media/#get_media_by_shortcode

      • searchMedia

        SearchMediaResponse searchMedia(SearchMediaRequest parameters)
        Search for recent media in a given area.
        Parameters:
        parameters - @link{SearchMediaRequest}
        Returns:
        SearchMediaResponse @link{SearchMediaResponse}
        See Also:
        https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/media/#get_media_search
